channel.title: Hyperion Questions
channel.description:
Mod can close.
Didn't realize how low the player base has gone since past years, and developing a Hyperion base starting at the level I would.. The peers I have on here would have quit by the time I get done revising it to my mindset most likely.
Gonna work on starting little 2d games in java and what not, start preparing for a little more.
Thanks anyways, Vain.

item.title: Hyperion Questions
item.dc:creator: @Adobe Adobe
item.description:
@Adobe wrote:

planetrsps:

The original Hyperion only has stall thieving so you would have to write your own skills.

Got the original, and that’s what I’m looking to do. That’s the point of learning all of this, writing your own code. Otherwise, I’d go with any PI out there.

  • sent you the files Vain

Read full topic

item.title: Hyperion Questions
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

just read through all the class names and packages tbh. hyperion is generally a decently organized source. unless it was repackaged by a tard.

send me a copy and i can skim over it and help you get the basics down.

Read full topic
